title: Avoid COVID-19 (Africa) Poster
credits: Adapted by Paul Frank from original, Copyright © 2020, Illustrations by Elaine Vitikainen https://ev-visuals.com/
summary: This is an A3 poster of Elaine Vitikainen's Avoid COVID-19 book (version 2)

12.en: Illustrations:  Ari and Elaine Vitikainen Information was taken from WHO websites such as https://www.who.int/emer gencies/diseases/novel-coronavir us-2019/advice-for-public Version 27.3.2020 Literacy for Women in Africa

17.en: Adapted by Paul Frank from original, Copyright © 2020, Illustrations by Elaine Vitikainen https://ev-visuals.com/

20.en: How to Create Posters with this Template

21.en: This template is for creating posters. You add pages that contain only a picture. Then you add text boxes to the page by right-clicking on the image and choosing "Add Text Box to Image":

22.en: This template is for creating posters. You add pages that contain only a picture. Then you add text boxes to the page by right-clicking on the image and choosing "Add Text Box to Image":

23.en: This template is for creating posters. You add pages that contain only a picture. Then you add text boxes to the page by right-clicking on the image and choosing "Add Text Box to Image":

26.en: Type words into the box. If the box is not big enough, use the mouse to change the size of the box. You can also move the box around the page with the mouse.

27.en: Type words into the box. If the box is not big enough, use the mouse to change the size of the box. You can also move the box around the page with the mouse.

31.en: Wash your hands regularly with soap and water, or clean them with alcohol-based hand rub.

34.en: Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.

39.en: Maintain 2 meters distance between yourself and others.

43.en: Stay informed on the latest developments about COVID-19. Follow advice given by your healthcare provider.

47.en: Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose of the used tissue immediately.

51.en: Stay home if you feel unwell. If you have fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.
